item.title: Doom Raiders
item.description: Summary An adventuring party not unlike the Trollskull crew After raiding every dungeon they could, they founded a mercenary compamy named the Black Network Eventually, they allied themselves with Manshoon leading to the Black Network’s transformation in to the Zhentarim Members Davil Starsong (Deceased) A human Rogue Stabbed in the back by Skeemo Weirdbottle as he betrayed his friends and helped Manshoon assassinate the Open Lord Tashlyn Yafeera - Istrid Horn - A Dwarven Shield Cleric Skeemo Weirdbottle - A Gnomish Wizard Ziraj the Hunter - A Orc Paladin Archer Faction History An adventuring party that made a name for themselves cleaning out the lairs of liches (known as “dooms”).

item.title: Factions
item.description: %% Begin Waypoint %% [[Doom Raiders]] [[Force Gray]] [[Zhentarim]] %% End Waypoint %%

item.title: Zhentarim
item.description: Summary A mercenary company turned gang that the Doom Raiders helped Manshoon found to fund his extremely expensive magical experiments
